meanings.sent1: The unalleviated pain in his back made it hard for him to sit for long.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed medication to help with the unalleviated discomfort.
meanings.sent3: Despite his best efforts, the unalleviated ache in his muscles persisted.
meanings.sent4: The unalleviated sorrow in her heart weighed heavily on her spirit.
meanings.sent5: The unalleviated burden of responsibility on his shoulders seemed never-ending.

meanings.sent1: The unalleviated tension in the room made everyone uneasy.
meanings.sent2: The lack of rain unalleviated the drought conditions in the region.
meanings.sent3: The unalleviated traffic jam caused frustration among the drivers.
meanings.sent4: Her unalleviated anxiety kept her up at night worrying.
meanings.sent5: The unalleviated workload left him feeling overwhelmed and exhausted.

meanings.sent1: The unalleviated heat of the sun beat down relentlessly.
meanings.sent2: The unalleviated noise from the construction site disrupted the peace.
meanings.sent3: The unalleviated expenses drained their savings quickly.
meanings.sent4: His unalleviated anger towards his boss affected his work performance.
meanings.sent5: The unalleviated pressure to succeed weighed heavily on her mind.
